Room.Name: Northeast Corner of Cellar, by Sign
Room.ShortDescription: This is the northeast corner of the farmer's large cellar.
Room.LongDescription: To the north a wooden sign is set in the stone wall. "Behold the entrance to the underground city." The small city down here is not near as large as Oceancrest, but is much older. Young adventurers come here in search of the legendary Emerald Armor, said to keep the wearer safe from all magical weapons. However, the young adventurer would be well advised to ask a veteren to accompany them in their quest.
